theWeaponMaster:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theWeaponMaster:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theWeaponMaster:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theWeaponMaster:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theWeaponMaster:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theWeaponMaster:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theWeaponMaster:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theWeaponMaster:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.NAME: Special Strike
theWeaponMaster:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theWeaponMaster:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theWeaponMaster:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theWeaponMaster:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !theWeaponMaster:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

theWeaponMaster:BreakerAtlasBlade.NAME: Atlas Blade
theWeaponMaster:BreakerAtlasBlade.DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Not implemented. NL Hit the opponent with !D! Ink damage.

theWeaponMaster:BreakerCleaver.NAME: [#bf3a3b]Cleaver
theWeaponMaster:BreakerCleaver.DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Deal !D! damage and heal for half the unblocked damage dealt. Not Implemented - Gain 1 Berserk stack.

theWeaponMaster:BreakerFenrir.NAME: Fenrir
theWeaponMaster:BreakerFenrir.DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Lose 3 HP and deal !D! damage. NL Upgrade this card every time you break shields.
theWeaponMaster:BreakerFenrir.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Lose 3 HP and deal !D! damage. NL Deal 25% extra damage and upgrade this card every time you break shields.

theWeaponMaster:BreakerShockwaveGauntlet.NAME: Leviathan Gauntlets
theWeaponMaster:BreakerShockwaveGauntlet.DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Armor_Break NL Hit the enemy for !D! damage. NL Take quarter damage if they don't block.
theWeaponMaster:BreakerShockwaveGauntlet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Armor_Break, Crush NL Hit the enemy for !D! damage. NL Take quarter damage if they don't block.

theWeaponMaster:AntiMagicAbbadon.NAME: Abbadon
theWeaponMaster:AntiMagicAbbadon.DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Not implemented - Deal !D! damage and drain Strength. NL Drain Dexterity if the opponent is casting a non-block skill.

theWeaponMaster:AntiMagicBrahmaastra.NAME: Brahmaastra
theWeaponMaster:AntiMagicBrahmaastra.DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL  Not implemented - All enemies lose !D! HP. NL Gain 2 Vulnerable

theWeaponMaster:AntiMagicCerberus.NAME: Cerberus
theWeaponMaster:AntiMagicCerberus.DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL  Not Implemented - Deal !D! plus 2 bonus damage for every buff an enemy has.

theWeaponMaster:AntiMagicShears.NAME: [#3abfbe]Atropos' [#3abfbe]Shears
theWeaponMaster:AntiMagicShears.DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL  Not Implemented - Deal !D! damage to your target and apply 2 Mana_Burn.

theWeaponMaster:BullyIntimidate.NAME: Intimidate
theWeaponMaster:BullyIntimidate.DESCRIPTION: Bully NL Reduce enemy strength by !M!.

theWeaponMaster:BullyTaunt.NAME: Taunt
theWeaponMaster:BullyTaunt.DESCRIPTION: Bully NL Apply 2 Vulnerable to an attacking enemy. NL Otherwise apply 2 weak and force the enemy to attack.
theWeaponMaster:BullyTaunt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Bully NL Apply 3 Weak to an attacking enemy. NL Otherwise apply 2 weak and force the enemy to attack.

theWeaponMaster:BullyWimp.NAME: Wimp
theWeaponMaster:BullyWimp.DESCRIPTION: Bully NL Apply !M! Weak to all enemies.

theWeaponMaster:BullyHostility.NAME: Hostility
theWeaponMaster:BullyHostility.DESCRIPTION: Bully NL Placeholder - Gain !M! Strength every turn.
